name: admin_users_invite
description: Invite a user to a workspace.

channel_ids.description: A comma-separated list of `channel_id`s for this user to join. At least one channel is required.

custom_message.description: An optional message to send to the user in the invite email.

email.description: The email address of the person to invite.

guest_expiration_ts.description: Timestamp when guest account should be disabled. Only include this timestamp if you are inviting a guest user and you want their account to expire on a certain date.

is_restricted.description: Is this user a multi-channel guest user? (default: false)

is_ultra_restricted.description: Is this user a single channel guest user? (default: false)

resend.description: Allow this invite to be resent in the future if a user has not signed up yet. (default: false)
